The Shorter Section 🔽The Ghost with the Lump of Food
“One eats rice, the other a lump of food,
And this woman eats meat and blood.
You eat feces and urine, so disgusting.
What action did you perform that ripened in this?”
“This one harmed his mother,
And this one was a swindler.
This one ate meat
And deceived with lies.
I was a human being among humans,
A householder, the chief of all the families.
I hid what I had,
Saying, ‘Don’t give anything to anyone.’
I covered it with lies,
Saying, ‘We don’t have it in the house.’
If I had anything, I hid it,
And my food became feces.
Because of that action,
And because of my lies,
